entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Barry's Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:49 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 03:00 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -0.7°C
Wind: ESE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:49 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:49 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 3:49 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
